title: Picnic
credit_line: Purchase: gift of the people of Pittsburgh through the efforts of the Women's Committee, Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute
provenance_text:
Maurice Brazil Prendergast [1858-1924], until 1915; Montross Gallery [1908-1926], New York, NY, 1915; John Quinn [1870-1924], New York, NY, 1915 until 1924; Estate of John Quinn, 1924 until February 1927; (sold at American Art Association, New York, NY, on February 11, 1927, lot no. 519); (Kraushaar Galleries [1885-], New York, NY, after February 11, 1927); Arthur F. Egner, South Orange, NJ, 1934 [1]; Mrs. John Malone; (James Graham and Sons [1857-], New York, NY, 1960); Victor D. Spark [1898-1991], New York NY, by 1972; purchased by Museum, December 1972 [2]. 
NOTES:1. Recorded as 1927 in catalogue raisonne; by 1934, when exhibited at the Whitney Museum of American Art. 2. Updated by CGK May 2012.
